definition: allowing communication in opposite directions simultaneously, an apartment having rooms on two floors that are connected by a staircase, change into a duplex
details:
adjective
- allowing communication in opposite directions simultaneously
= example: allowing communication in opposite directions simultaneously
- (used technically of a device or process) having two parts
= example: (used technically of a device or process) having two parts
noun
- an apartment having rooms on two floors that are connected by a staircase
= synonyms: duplex apartment
- a house with two units sharing a common wall
= synonyms: duplex house, semidetached house
verb
- change into a duplex
